thread.title: Singapore City Explorers Pt Ltd Announces Launch as the Newest Travel Agency in Singapore
thread.title_full: Singapore City Explorers Pt Ltd Announces Launch as the Newest Travel Agency in Singapore

author: prbuzz.com
title: Singapore City Explorers Pt Ltd Announces Launch as the Newest Travel Agency in Singapore
text:
Singapore City Explorers Pt Ltd announces their launch as the Newest Travel Agency in Singapore last August 2015.
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Contact: Mr. Rene Ng
Company: Singapore City Explorers Pte Ltd
Address: 42 Canberra Drive #02-08. Singapore 768434
Website: http://singaporecityexplorers.com
Email Address: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
Telephone No : 65-98207168
Singapore City Explorers Pte Ltd announces their launch as the newest travel agency in Singapore on August 2015. Apart from their regular services such as ticketing, sight seeing, transport and hotel lodging. The Company’s main focus is on the niche tours that emphasizes on their local expertise. Singapore City Explorer’s managing director Mr. Rene Ng’s slogan for the company is “experience the city, with a local expert beside you”. If you are a tourist in Singapore looking for a true local experience then this is the company for you.
The timing of the Singapore City Explorers travel agency launch is in line with their first niche tour “Chinatown food adventure” launched a year ago. Over the one year period. Chinatown food adventure has drawn substantial crowd and ranked well on tripadvisor . The world’s largest travel review site. ( see Chinatown food adventure in tripadvisor ) Mr. Rene Ng himself is a license tourist guide in Singapore and understands the demands of a discerning tourist having dealt with many himself. He has personally designed and conducted the chinatown food adventure tour. Show casing Singapore’s best known hawker culture to any foodie tourist who wants to experience the most authentic Singapore delicacy and it’s culture at the same time. The 3.5 hours gastronomical journey will take you into the heartlands of the biggest enclave in Singapore, Chinatown. Also know as “Ni Che Sui” or bullock cart water. Sampling up to 10 dishes of the local hawker favorites, at the same time learning about it's culture through the eating and meandering around the neighborhood. It’s a crash course to the local cultures, done in less than 4 hours. The company is now working on other niche tours like biking and heartland tours.
To extend their reach globally, Singapore City Explorers Pt Ltd have teamed up with Urban Adventures a division of Intrepid Travel. A leading experiential tour company to over 70,000 travelers annually. Singapore City Explorers Pt Ltd aspires to offer the most competitive pricing in the market with personalize services. All these are done through minimizing their business overheads via online platform and collaborating with multiple service providers in the industry to provide customers with a wider coverage and flexibility.
 ###
To those who are interested to know more about the services offered by Singapore City Explorers Pt Ltd or partnership matters. Please visit them at http://singaporecityexplorers.com for more details and information.
